about_the_game:
Give the dark and evil side of your game a new face! These giant and deadly demons will surely destroy anything that comes before them!

These monsters are crafted delicately to match to the 4 color-variations of background graphics. For the sunset background you can use sunset-compatible monsters. Also contains walking sprites for each monster and they come in shadow version as well!

Features:

* 4 monster battlers in 4 color variations; day / sunset / night / rain. Total of 16 side-view battler graphics.
* Each character comes with walking sprites in 2 variations (normal and dark shadow). Total of 8 sprites.
* These graphics are for RPG Maker use only
